de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index

Interface KNNIndex<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Index, Result
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMaterializeKNNPreprocessor, DeLiCluTreeIndex, KNNJoinMaterializeKNNPreprocessor, MaterializeKNNAndRKNNPreprocessor, MaterializeKNNPreprocessor, MetricalIndexApproximationMaterializeKNNPreprocessor, MkAppTreeIndex, MkCoPTreeIndex, MkMaxTreeIndex, MkTabTreeIndex, MTreeIndex, PartialVAFile, PartitionApproximationMaterializeKNNPreprocessor, RandomSampleKNNPreprocessor, RStarTreeIndex, SpatialApproximationMaterializeKNNPreprocessor, VAFile

    public interface KNNIndex<O>
extends Index
    Index with support for kNN queries.

    • Method Detail

      • getKNNQuery

        <D extends Distance<D>> KNNQuery<O,D> getKNNQuery(DistanceQuery<O,D> distanceQuery,
                                                Object... hints)
        Get a KNN query object for the given distance query and k. This function MAY return null, when the given distance is not supported!
        Type Parameters:
        D - Distance type
        Parameters:
        distanceQuery - Distance query
        hints - Hints for the optimizer
        Returns:
        KNN Query object or null
